content:
Hi Fellow Discord User 
 This is an example message! Use \n to change lines and to ping people use <user>

embeds.title: This can be a link
embeds.description: You can have embeds however you like them. As long as you send them in the correct format, they will be sent!

fields.name: <-- You can add any colour but be sure it's in decimal
fields.value: This is an embed field, you can add this too. You can delete anything from here to not have it show up.

fields.name: You can add multiple of these lol
fields.value: You can add images too and set their size

author.name: Use this website to make your Embed easily.
